neighbors.name: FFPLS Hedgesville LLC
neighbors.claims: FFPLS Hedgesville LLC is the owner of approximately 58 acres along WV Route 9 (Hedgesville Rd) where a multi-lot commercial development known as “Maple Ridge Station” has been proposed ([source](https://wvlegals.com/public-notice-28467/)). The development plan includes a proposed 33,100 sq. ft. multi-bay vehicle and truck maintenance facility on Lot 1 ([source](https://wvlegals.com/public-notice-28467/)). The LLC has marketed portions of the tract for sale, including a 27.3-acre lot listed at approximately $2.32 million and a 4-acre lot for $400,000 ([source](https://www.crexi.com/properties/WV/Martinsburg)), indicating an intent to develop or sell the land for profit. Listings note that the seller will provide site work for an additional cost ([source](https://www.loopnet.com/Listing/1810-Hedgesville-Road-Martinsburg-WV/35028923/)). The entity is listed as a defendant in multiple civil actions in Berkeley County, including Case Nos. 2022-C-000073 and 2022-C-000074 ([source](https://apps.sos.wv.gov/business/service-of-process/Home/Search?DefendantName=FFPLS%20HEDGESVILLE%20LLC)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Privately-held land developer with a single identified commercial project; no record of broad community leadership or political office found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the LLC’s managing agent or developer directly; emphasize how the project can coexist or even enhance their site’s value (e.g. infrastructure upgrades). If needed, offer coordination on access or buffers to address any concerns about property value or visibility.
